casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Thomas, Appellant.
Submitted November 11, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Melvin Dildine, Assistant Defender, and Herman I. Polloek, Defender, for appellant.
Edward Cf. Rendell and James D. Crawford, Assistant District Attorneys, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
January 15, 1969:
